title: Air Conditioning, High speed internet, New Comfortable BBQ Pit Area
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-New Dog Park!', '-New Designer Interior Paint Colors', '-Private Patio', '-Dishwasher', '-Refrigerator', '-Newly Painted Exteriors', '-New Fully Renovated Interiors!', '-Newly Renovated Kitchens With Quartz Countertops, New Cabinets, and Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Range', '-Laundry Care Center', '-Near Public Transit', '-Carpeting', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
